item.title: [Part 4] Setup Grafana With Prometheus
item.description: As you know Prometheus already having UI (localhost:9090). But it is not enough to give you better visualization on one screen. For better visualization and a graphical representation, we are going to use Grafana. What is Grafana? As grafana.com says ”Grafana is the open-source analytics and monitoring solution for every database.” This means Grafana is an independent tool for analytics and monitor which gives your various types of Graphs.
